title: Summer Semester
body: The summer semester is a great opportunity to catch up or get ahead in your studies. Enjoy flexible schedules, lighter campus crowds, and focused learning.

title: Campus Event Highlights
body: Catch up on the most exciting student-led events from this month at UoB.

title: Club Fair 2025
body: Don't miss the annual Club Fair this weekend – music, booths, and fun!

title: New Semester Begins
body: Welcome back! The new semester kicks off with exciting orientation events and campus activities for all students.

title: Student Clubs Expo
body: Explore UoB’s variety of student clubs! From coding to photography, there's a place for everyone to belong.

title: Graduation Ceremony 2025
body: Congratulations to our graduates! The official ceremony will be held at Isa Cultural Hall this June.

title: Library Week
body: Join us for book swaps, research tutorials, and quiet competitions in the main library.

title: Volunteer Day
body: Sign up to clean beaches with the UoB Environmental Club this Saturday and earn community hours.
